summary: Completed frontend testing of Saqr App full-screen ads viewer and updated bottom navigation. All requested features are working correctly. Fixed a minor bug in touch event handlers.
critical_code_review_comments: FullScreenAdsViewer.jsx: useCallback for handleKeyDown has missing dependencies (goToNext, goToPrevious, onClose) - ESLint warning but not causing issues
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/components/FullScreenAdsViewer.jsx - Added null checks for touch event handlers to prevent 'Cannot read properties of undefined' error
context_for_next_testing_agent: Full-screen ads viewer is working with black background, yellow progress bar, tap-to-show controls. Bottom nav has 4 items only (Home, Advertiser, Profile, Ads). Star/notifications icons removed.

full_screen_ads_viewer.details: Black background, yellow progress bar at top, controls (timer, mute button) appear on tap and hide after 2 seconds

bottom_navigation.details: Contains exactly 4 items: الرئيسية (Home), أعلن الآن (Advertiser), حسابي (Profile), إعلانات (Ads - red highlighted)

star_notifications_removed.details: No star or notifications icons in bottom navigation

ads_button_opens_fullscreen.details: Clicking إعلانات button opens full-screen ads viewer

home_page_ads_list.details: Home page displays ads list correctly with Samsung ad visible

swipe_navigation.details: Swipe up/down for ads navigation, swipe left/right to exit - code implemented correctly

touch_event_fix.details: Added null checks for e.targetTouches[0] in handleTouchStart and handleTouchMove to prevent runtime errors
